title: Any accident arising out of operation or maintenance of the lifts shall be duly reported to the competent authority i
clause_text: Any accident arising out of operation or maintenance of the lifts shall be duly reported to the competent authority i.e., Lift Inspector of the Government of Maharashtra.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Any accident arising out of operation or maintenance of the lifts shall be duly reported to the competent authority i.e., Lift Inspector of the Government of Maharashtra.
